title: Issues with Pixel Swipe Commands
content:
So I like the swipe actions for back, home, and show apps, but I'm having some issues with them that go away when I use the buttons instead. 

Number one I've had for a while is the youtube mini player won't show up. If I navigate from youtube using a swipe command it doesn't activate the mini player for some reason. 

Second issue only showed up after the Android 11 update. now I want to try to return to home using a swipe command, it takes me to the Pixel launcher instead of my Nova launcher. Double checked and Nova is still set to my default launcer. 

Any advice would be appreciated.
